title: Championship Zed Back Animation
body: A small bug that's kind of annoying, but championship Zed's back animation is always facing top right, please fix it

replies.body:
Hey Nigalo -

In this particular animation, the recall is working as intended. We sometimes lock recalls in a particular camera angle to ensure you can see the recall. This is generally done when a champion has a prop in the recall. Pool Party Leona and Haunted Zyra are other examples where the camera is always locked to the south to see the recall animation.  :)
Same with some other animations like Gnar's dance
